## Contact

This event is organized by [NBIS](https://nbis.se) in co-operation with National Genomics Infrastructure ([NGI](https://ngisweden.scilifelab.se/)). NBIS and NGI are platforms at the Science for Life Laboratory ([SciLifeLab](https://www.scilifelab.se/)). NBIS is the Swedish node of [Elixir](https://elixir-europe.org/). 

For queries, write to us at **edu.intro-ngs[at]nbis.se**.
